description.narrative: For With the funds, Alerta Isla Riesco will register itself as a foundation, develop its communications platforms, and publicize its work. Isla Riesco is area of rich biodiversity, with many rare and endangered species, and livelihoods in the region are largely dependent on livestock and tourism. However, open pit mining activities are threatening the air, water, and soil and destroying native forests and habitats. To strengthen its presence and better defend and represent advocacy efforts to protect the environment, heritage, and culture of Isla Riesco, the group will register itself as a legal entity. It will develop alliances with like minded organizations and agencies interested in sustainable development and environmental conservation on the island; update its platform and social networks; build the capacity of members to generate and circulate media content; and develop a documentary on the rich biodiversity of the island
